snippet: Afraid to look as if they're second tier, big law firms are reluctant to reduce the $160,000 salary for first-year associates. Instead, they're hiring fewer lawyers.
abstract: Afraid to look as if they're second tier, big law firms are reluctant to reduce the $160,000 salary for first-year associates. Instead, they're hiring fewer lawyers.

headline.main: The Toppling of Top-Tier Lawyer Jobs
